name: istio_nodes
business_justification: The AWS Load Balancer Controller manages AWS Elastic Load Balancers for a Kubernetes cluster. istio_nodes requires bi-directional access between other eks nodes on port 8081 to support aws-lb-controller controller connectivity required for istio ingress gateways.
